com.nkoiv.mists.game.AI

Class CreatureAI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nkoiv.mists.game.AI.CreatureAI
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CompanionAI

    public class CreatureAI
extends Object
    CreatureAI is the main AI routine for creatures. Each acting creature should have its own CreatureAI, as it stores the creatures states and intentions
    Author:
    nikok

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean act(double time)
      act() is the main loop for AI it's called whenever it's given creatures turn to do things TimeSinceAction governs creature decisionmaking No creature needs to act on every tick!

    • Method Detail

      • act

        public boolean act(double time)
        act() is the main loop for AI it's called whenever it's given creatures turn to do things TimeSinceAction governs creature decisionmaking No creature needs to act on every tick!
        Parameters:
        time - Time passed since the last action
        Returns:
        Returns true if the creature was able to act
